test_setup.then: Task with ID 1 is updated and returned in the response.
test_setup.when: PUT request sent to /tasks/1 with status 'in_progress'.

test_cases.description: Attempt to update a task without specifying the Content-Type header.
test_cases.name: Update Task Missing Content-Type Header

test_setup.given: Task with ID 123 exists in the database.
test_setup.then: API returns 415 Unsupported Media Type error.
test_setup.when: PUT request sent to /tasks/123 without Content-Type header.

test_cases.description: Attempt to update a task with status field set to null.
test_cases.name: Update Task with Null Status Value

test_setup.given: Task with ID 123 exists in the database.
test_setup.then: API returns 400 Bad Request error.
test_setup.when: PUT request sent to /tasks/123 with status set to null.
